author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...HONE BECOMES A TROPICAL STORM AGAIN AS IT MOVES NORTHWEST SLOWLY....
summary:
...HONE BECOMES A TROPICAL STORM AGAIN AS IT MOVES NORTHWEST SLOWLY....
 As of 5:00 AM HST Sat Aug 31
 the center of Hone was located near 22.5, -176.0
 with movement NW at 3 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1007 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Hone (CP1/CP012024)
